properties.areaDesc: Atlantic Waters of Puerto Rico AND USVI from 10 NM to 19.5N
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 11 at 10:04PM AST until January 15 at 6:00AM AST by NWS San Juan PR
properties.description:
...GALE WARNING IN EFFECT FOR ALL OF THE ATLANTIC WATERS UNTIL 2
PM SUNDAY...

.Hazardous seas and fresh to strong trade winds are expected
across the regional waters well into the upcoming week as a result
of a strong surface pressure gradient. Frequent gale-force wind
gusts are expected night through tomorrow, especially with rain
showers quickly moving westward.

* WHAT...For the Gale Warning, east winds around 20 to 30 kt
with frequent gusts up to 35 kt and seas 9 to 14 feet. For the
Small Craft Advisory, east winds 20 to 30 kt with occasionally
higher gusts and seas 9 to 14 feet expected.

* WHERE...The Atlantic and Caribbean waters.

* WHEN...For the Gale Warning, until 2 PM AST Sunday. For the
Small Craft Advisory, Now to 6 AM AST Wednesday.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds will cause hazardous seas which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should alter plans to avoid these hazardous conditions.
Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter course, and/or secure the
vessel for severe conditions.

NWSheadline: GALE WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 2 PM AST SUNDAY... ...SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 2 PM SUNDAY TO 6 AM AST WEDNESDAY
